outputs.output_descr:
Environment and Energy issues integrated into policies, plans  and programmes of governments as well as increased rural access to affordable cleaner energy alternatives. Environmental conventions domesticated and sound locally appropriate techniques in place for flood erosion and desrtification control. 
This project includes components which will support national iniatives that will contribute to environmental sustainability, an imperative for sustainable growth and poverty reduction.
Other major features include (i) progromoting the integration od environmental concerns into developmental concerns into development planning policies and programmes, (ii) strengthening national capacity to reverse environmental degradation.

project_descr: Environment and Energy issues integrated into policies, plans and programmes of governments, domestication of environmental conventions as well as increased rural access to affordable cleaner energy alternatives.
